long_description: From trail to sidewalk, the Mammut Guye Jacket is ready for adventure. It combines sleek style and high-performance Polartec(R) Alpha(R) insulation for superb warmth at a very low weight. Because Polartec Alpha is more stable than other types of synthetic insulation, thinner fabrics can be used as backing to increase breathability and save weight. Stretch-fleece panels from hem to cuff along sides of body and arms enhance mobility. Stretch cuffs let you push sleeves up on your arms if you want. Inner mesh drop-in pocket stows a hat or gloves. Zippered hand pockets and chest pocket secure essentials. Chest pocket features a media port and collar has a small elastic loop for channeling earphones. The Mammut Guye Jacket for men features zipper garages and easy-grasp zipper pulls.
short_description: From trail to sidewalk, the Mammut Guye Jacket is ready for adventure. It combines sleek style and high-performance Polartec(R) Alpha(R) insulation for superb warmth at a very low weight.
